name: IdleDev
description:
Overview:
Welcome to the world of software development where you can live out your ultimate developer dreams, face frustrating challenges, and rise above the corporate chaos! IdleDev is a captivating simulation game that puts you in the shoes of a fledgling developer striving to create the next big thing in the tech industry. Will you rise to the top through your coding prowess, or will you succumb to the pressures of an annoying boss, financial struggles, and desperate work-hour cheats?

Key Features:

Annoying Boss: Every developer's nightmare comes to life as you face off against your perpetually irritable boss.

Money Talks: Struggle with budget constraints, allocate resources wisely, and make crucial financial decisions to keep your projects afloat. Balance your creative ambitions with the practicalities of keeping the company's bank account in the green.

Unconventional Strategies: Tired of the 9-to-5 grind? Explore creative ways to cheat work hours without getting caught by your boss.

Office Shenanigans: Beat up your boss with keyboard or whatever you find or simply yell at him for being annoying

Dynamic Storyline: Your choices determine the outcome of your dev story. Will you become bankrupt ? Will you die for your work or just leave because of rage ?

Get ready to experience the exhilarating rollercoaster of software development in IdleDev. Embrace the highs and lows, navigate the quirky challenges of office life, and emerge as a legend in the tech world. Can you balance success, creativity, and a little bit of mischief to reach the pinnacle of your developer journey? The virtual cubicles await your coding wizardry!
